a.n: THE NEXT ASIAN MIRACLE - TECHNOLOGY, THE NEXT FRONTIER

p.k: More than ever before, science and technology have affected the shape and course of society so pervasively that the world is now on the threshold of a technological age. Despite the successful examples of technology-embracing countries like Japan and Korea, South East Asia has, until recently, been slow to jump on the technology bandwagon, and only now have they finally realized the tremendous potential in harnessing the power of innovation and technology.
